channel.title: Confessions of ShadowSyntax
channel.description:
I'm now a player moderator on RuneScape.
This means that for now I'm going to stop writing SCAR Scripts (although I never released many) and discussing conspiracy theories (although god knows how many are true).
I've gone to the dark side - the losing side - because the amount of Aryan users sickens me. Aryan killed RuneScape cheating. Sure - now cheating is alot easier, but theres no challenge to it anymore.
Now to be honest, I don't play RuneScape all that much. But everytime I come across a tree infested with thousands of Aryan using cockfuckers I'm going to report you all.
Not that it matters much with the new updates that are supposedly being implemented into the game.
Many of you won't believe me, many of you won't care. But I'm going to make it perfectly clear that I'm always going to stick to the losing side - which right now happens to be Jagex.
I'm still going to post on the forums just as much as I did before. I'm not going anywhere. I just wanted to make some confessions :P :D

item.title: Confessions of ShadowSyntax
item.dc:creator: @inferno inferno
item.description:
@inferno wrote:

I don’t really care that your a player mod, doesn’t make you a different person. You can still do all the same stuff and still hang around here. If you didn’t report those lvl 3 yew cutters already then it’s good that you’re starting now, I do most of the time because 99% of them are leeching faggots who deserve to never auto again.

I’m sure there are quite a few more mods in the cheating communities but we just don’t know about them.

Read full topic

item.title: Confessions of ShadowSyntax
item.dc:creator: @ShadowSyntax ShadowSyntax
item.description:
@ShadowSyntax wrote:

[quote=“VG_Kobra, post:23, topic:2466”][quote author=ShadowSyntax link=topic=2665.msg24875#msg24875 date=1146957510]
I’m now a player moderator on RuneScape.

This means that for now I’m going to stop writing SCAR Scripts (although I never released many) and discussing conspiracy theories (although god knows how many are true).

I’ve gone to the dark side - the losing side - because the amount of Aryan users sickens me.
Aryan killed RuneScape cheating. Sure - now cheating is alot easier, but theres no challenge to it anymore.

Now to be honest, I don’t play RuneScape all that much. But everytime I come across a tree infested with thousands of Aryan using cockfuckers I’m going to report you all.

Not that it matters much with the new updates that are supposedly being implemented into the game.

Many of you won’t believe me, many of you won’t care. But I’m going to make it perfectly clear that I’m always going to stick to the losing side - which right now happens to be Jagex.

I’m still going to post on the forums just as much as I did before. I’m not going anywhere. I just wanted to make some confessions
[/quote]

Wait a minute, You said you are going to stick the losing side which you said happens to be JageX, Then why did you state “I’ve gone to the dark side (Autoing) - the losing side”

I’d say you need to spend some time sitting on it to decide which is the losing side and then to post.[/quote]

By the dark side i meant Jagex.

And White Castle I know what you mean by RuneScape getting more retarded. lol

Read full topic

item.title: Confessions of ShadowSyntax
item.dc:creator: @White_Castle White Castle
item.description:
@White_Castle wrote:

I got banned for testing out some early modified client I made on my mod account, when I didn’t know shit about java. And yes, they ban you faster.

Also, when you’re in a position of power like that, you feel obliged to play more often, and RuneScape just seems to be getting more retarded.

Read full topic
